name: Snake Hard Mode
description:
Hard Game of Snake. Multiple modes to impede your progress of growing your snake.  Best Score wins,  good luck and god speed.

Major bug notice: when a vertical input button and horizontal button are clicked with the correct timing, the snake will go into itself and end your run.  Probably some minor bugs with the body. 

First Official game produced by MatiDev (me). Thanks for trying it out. If you play the game, leave your best high score in the comments, if its even bearable to play lol. Have a great day.
